column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////The service was fantastic. When we sat down
column4: and discussed the idea of tapas since we had a newbie with us. We decided on the white sangria after much discussion. After the first pitcher was gone
column5: we couldn't decide on what sangria to get next. Our waiter brought over a sample for us to try to decide. He was very helpful
column7: and made sure that we were happy customers.
